meanings.definition: A synthetic steroid hormone used to treat endometriosis and fibrocystic breast disease.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed danazols to help with my endometriosis.
meanings.sent2: Many women find relief from fibrocystic breast disease with danazols.
meanings.sent3: I never thought I'd be saying thank you to danazols for making me feel better.
meanings.sent4: Danazols are like warriors fighting against endometriosis in the body.
meanings.sent5: The power of danazols to combat these conditions is truly remarkable.

meanings.sent1: The pharmacy ran out of danazols, so I had to wait for a new shipment.
meanings.sent2: She ordered two bottles of danazols for her treatment.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally bought too many danazols, now I have a surplus!
meanings.sent4: The shelves were stocked with danazols, ready to help those in need.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with the scent of danazols, a sign of healing and relief.
